DOC.brief_summary: We will give intravenous fat molecules to help us understand how the fat that is released from peoples fat cells is used. This will be done when people are eating, not eating and walking.
DOC.brief_title: FFA Metabolism in Different Types of Human Obesity
DOC.criteria: BMI 2836 upper body obesity and lower body obesity nonobese BMI 1924. Females premenopausal. Must be a nonsmoker. BP> 160/95 on HTN meds, known systemic illness. Medications that affect fat metabolism. We do no cover travel expenses. Known heart and vascular disease.
